Author: catsinsunglassess
Text: I feel this. I was babysitting one night and the kids asked if i was sick. I hope to god my daughter doesnâ€™t pick up on how i eat. We still go out to restaurants every once in a while and i eat but at home is a different story. My best friend in high school lost his mom to anorexia and he had no idea she suffered from it growing up, although he said looking back it made sense after the fact. I am still healthy now so i hope that never happens to my daughter.
